thread.title: Gard: a player wins the sum of 500,000 euros in a scratch card game
thread.title_full: Gard: a player wins the sum of 500,000 euros in a scratch card game

author: ivy.
title: Gard: a player wins the sum of 500,000 euros in a scratch card game
text: [Gard](/tag/Gard): a player wins the sum of 500,000 euros in a scratch card game [](https://euro.dayfr.com/content/uploads/2024/09/19/edf703ce04.jpg) In Beaucaire, in the [Gard](/tag/Gard), a man won the sum of 500,000 euros in the X20 scratch card game. This regular customer had come to the newsagent to collect a winnings of 30 euros, reports [France](/tag/France) Bleu Gard Lozère. He then decided to try his luck again by buying two new scratch cards. The first, a “Cash” turned out to be a losing one. But the second, the X20, allowed him to win the jackpot. Read also:Haute- [Marne](/tag/Marne): a player wins the jackpot of 14 million euros in the Loto draw The manager, who is used to seeing this customer take game tickets, is still shocked by his victory. But the shock is all the greater for the winner. “I felt an emotion of incredible intensity, he told the FDJ. For me, the game is like a sports competition. I felt like I won the gold medal.” The player plans to help a relative with a real estate project. He also wants to go on a trip to South America.
